ValidationRule.description: Exporting Reporting Utilized” and “Complexity” Needs to be required fields before a GL Onboarding case can be changed to solved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c , 'Set Up Complete'),OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Complexity__c)), ISBLANK(TEXT( Exporting_Reporting_Utilized__c )) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 'Exporting Reporting Utilized' and 'Complexity' are required before completing Set Up.
